pages.title: Skinning Knives
pages.text: The skinning knives are used for skinning mobs and obtaining the fur/skin. To skin a carcass it must be fully drained first, then right clicking on the carcass whilst holding the skinning knife. Like the cleavers the skinning knives come in 5 materials, all do the same again with the exception of Netherite which is strong enough to skin boss carcasses.
